General.Name: Pantech Group Holdings Bhd
General.Description: Pantech Group Holdings Berhad, an investment holding company, manufactures and sells steel pipes, fittings, flanges, valves, and other related products in Malaysia, the Republic of Singapore, the United Kingdom, and internationally. The company operates through three segments: Trading, Manufacturing, and Investment Holding. It engages in the trading, supply, and stocking of high pressure seamless and specialized steel pipes, fittings, flanges, valves, and other related products; and flow control solutions, including actuators and controls. The company also manufactures and supplies butt-welded carbon steel fittings, high frequency induction long bends, stainless steel and alloy pipes, and related products, as well as provides milling, machining, and welding services for tubes and pipe fittings in special metals. In addition, it is involved in the hot dip galvanizing; treatment and coating of metals; engineering fabrication works; manufacturing and trading of industrial consumable products; provision of metal precision machining, engineering, and turnkey solutions; and property investment and management. The company's products are used in oil and gas, gas reticulation, marine, onshore and offshore heavy engineering, power generation, petrochemicals, palm oil refining, pharmaceutical, water, and other related industries. Pantech Group Holdings Berhad was founded in 1987 and is headquartered in Pasir Gudang, Malaysia.
